Translations.Text: geuleohgie oneul yeogiseo geuege hyeol-yug-eun eobs-eumyeo
goleum ioeeneun meog-eul geos-i eobsnola
geugeos-eul meogneun janeun ojig joejieun jadeul ppun-ila
geuleoni naneun geudaedeul-i boneun geos-eul dugo maengsehanola
geuligo geudaedeul-i boji moshaneun geos-eul dugo maengsehanola
jinsillo geugeos-eun myeong-yeloun sadoui mal-ini
geugeos-eun siin-ui mal-i anila. geudaedeul-i midneun geos-eun jogeum-il ppun-ideola
geugeos-eun jeomsulgaui maldo anila. geudaedeul-i gip-i saeng-gaghaneun geos-eun jogeum-il ppun-ideola
man-yuui junim-eulobuteo naelyeoon geos-ila
man-yag geu(muhammadeu)ga na-e gwanhae yeoleo maldeul jung-ui ilbuleul jieonaessdamyeon
naneun geuleul ganglyeoghi umkyeojab-ass-eul geos-ila
geuleon hu sillo naneun geulobuteo daedongmaeg-eul kkeunh-eo beolyeoss-eul geos-ila
geuleom-edo geudaedeul jung eotteon nugudo geubun-eul galomagji moshal geos-ila
sillo geugeos(kkulan)eun (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehaneun jadeul-eul wihan tteoollim-ila
jinsillo naneun geudaedeul jung-e jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-i iss-eum-eul algo issnola

geuligo jinsillo geugeos(kkulan-eun) hwagsilhan jinlila
geuleoni geudaeneun gajang wieomhasin geudae junim-ui ileum-eul deunop-ila
yoguhaneun jaga dagchyeool beol-eul yoguhayeossdoda
(geu beol-eun) bulsinjadeul-eul wihan geos-euloseo, geugeos(beol)eul jeojihal jonjaeneun eobsnola
(geu beol-eun) seungcheon-ui gil-eul soyuhasin hananim-eulobuteo (oneun geos-ila)
geunal cheonsadeulgwa yeonghon-i geubunkkelo ollagani geunal-ui gigan-eun omannyeon-ila
geuleoni geudaeneun aleumdabge innaehala
sillo geudeul-eun geugeos(beol)eul meolge bojiman
naneun geugeos(beol)eul gakkabge bonola
geunal haneul-eun eong-gin gileumcheoleom doel geos-ila
geuligo sandeul-eun yangteolcheoleom doel geos-ila
ttohan hyeol-yug-eun (daleun) hyeol-yug-e daehae mudji anh-eul geos-ila
